question: Who has been appointed as the first woman chief proctor BHU?
explanation: The Banaras Hindu University (BHU) has appointed Royana Singh as the first woman as its chief proctor of the institution. Royana would be succeeding O.N. Singh, who resigned on 26 September. The appointment was approved by Vice Chancellor Girish Chandra Tripathi. Royana served as an assistant professor at the Institute of Medical Science (Anatomy Department).
